channel.title: Summoning
channel.description: So I want to get 52 summoning. I've gotten myself up to 20 and have no clue what to do now. I want to keep the cost low, I'm looking for anything between 1-2m. Now what pouches should I make and what obelisk should I use? What and where should I get my charms? I have 30 gold charms, 150 green, 144 crimson, and 13 blue. How far will that get me?

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @maminerr maminerr
item.description:
@maminerr wrote:

;D :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :mad:
:o :rolleyes: :eek: :eek: :eek: ;D ;D

is that better for you?

actually, yes, thanks

youre very welcome.
:mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :o ;D

;D :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :eek: :mad:

id rather fuck the smileys :o :rolleyes: :eek: :eek: :eek: ;D ;D

especially this one: right?[/quote]

yes, because it reminds me of you <3
:mad: :eek: :rolleyes: :o ;D

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Scratch that I’m at 33 summoning now. Problem is, the only place I know of getting crimson charms is at kbd and hellhounds.
Wayyy to slow. Any suggestions?

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:7, topic:323854”][quote author=maminerr link=topic=420256.msg3087476#msg3087476 date=1262617100]
i thought i replied too this hours ago
crimsons are the fastest and most efficient way of leveling summoning.
i suggest you do spirit scorpians until 32.
then do honey badgers until 52.
then trade your pouches for shards or sell for money.
[/quote]

i thought i told you this
maminerr why do you type your messages like this.
it looks kinda stupid and is awkward to read
also you use many smiles.
kind of like mitbs’s early post

:|[/quote]
yeah its pretty fucking gay

@eczema3 wrote:

crimson charms are good, but are expensive as dick to use. I got 53 summoning, it wasn’t cheap, something like 3 - 4m total.

@gothic_queen wrote:

Summoning sucks.
I just killed some rock crab thingy that dropped like 10 charms per and saved them, but it costs a shit load.

item.title: Summoning
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“cows_be_sacred, post:1, topic:323854”]So I want to get 52 summoning. I’ve gotten myself up to 20 and have no clue what to do now.
I want to keep the cost low, I’m looking for anything between 1-2m. Now what pouches should I make
and what obelisk should I use? What and where should I get my charms? I have 30 gold charms, 150 green, 144 crimson,
and 13 blue. How far will that get me?[/quote]Rofl, those charms will get you shit. I did 24-32 summoning yesterday and I used 486 gold charms (486 iron ores as secondaries) and 486*7 for the amount of shards. It ain’t cheap.

Read full topic
